author: Chantal Da Silva
title: Nearly 40% of World's Population Living in Countries With Closed Borders Amid Coronavirus Outbreak, Analysis Finds
description: Meanwhile, more than 90% of people are living in countries with travel restrictions amid the COVID-19 outbreak.
content:
Nearly 40 percent of people around the world are living in countries that have completely closed their borders to noncitizens and nonresidents amid the coronavirus outbreak, Pew Research Center analysis has found.
